title: Tottenham 2-0 Brentford, Manchester City 3-0 Sunderland, and more: football – live
summary: John Brewin will provide live updates on goals and significant match events from the 3pm Premier League kick-offs and other matches. Fans can follow along for real-time commentary and insights. Stay tuned for the latest developments in the games.

title: Chelsea frustrated by Bournemouth to lose further ground on title rivals
summary: Chelsea remains in fourth place in the Premier League, trailing leaders Arsenal by eight points. They played to a 0-0 draw against Bournemouth. This result keeps Chelsea competitive but highlights a lack of scoring opportunities.

title: Leeds United v Liverpool: Premier League – live
summary: The misfiring champions are set to face off against Leeds United at Elland Road. Scott Murray will provide minute-by-minute updates on the match. Fans are eager to see how the struggling team performs in this crucial game.

title: Premier League top scorers 2025-26: who is leading race for golden boot?
summary: The English Premier League's current top goal scorers are showcasing their skills as they compete for the title of leading scorer this season. Key players are making significant contributions with impressive goal tallies. Fans are eagerly watching the race as the season progresses.

title: Senior DWP civil servant blames victims for carer’s allowance scandal
summary: Neil Couling attributed the crisis to failings by individual claimants, while a report highlighted "unacceptable" shortcomings within the Department for Work and Pensions (DWP). The conflicting perspectives underscore the complexities surrounding the issues faced by the DWP. The controversy continues as the debate on accountability unfolds.
